events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request regarding returning the wrong product has been categorized under Refund.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah M., who handles refund support cases.
Hello! I'm Sarah, here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, may I have a photo of the item you received and the order invoice?
Here is the order number 987654321 and attached are the photos of the wrong item and the invoice.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt help. I appreciate the quick resolution offer.
The refund process is now complete on our side. Expect the amount to be credited shortly.
Just checking in to ensure that the refund has been received and if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was successful and no further issues were reported, the case has now been closed.
